meta.description: Optimize the number of bags of subsoil and topsoil to minimize water usage while respecting capacity and composition constraints.

sets.name: SOIL_TYPES
sets.description: Types of soil available for the garden bed.

params.name: water_requirement
params.description: Water required to hydrate one bag of each soil type per day.

params.name: total_capacity
params.description: Total capacity of bags that can be transported.

params.name: min_topsoil
params.description: Minimum number of topsoil bags required.

params.name: max_topsoil_percentage
params.description: Maximum percentage of topsoil bags allowed.

vars.name: bags
vars.description: Number of bags to be bought for each soil type.

objective.name: min_total_water
objective.description: Minimize the total amount of water required to hydrate the garden bed.

constraints.name: total_capacity_constraint
constraints.description: Total number of bags must not exceed the truck's capacity.

constraints.name: min_topsoil_constraint
constraints.description: At least 10 bags of topsoil must be used.

constraints.name: max_topsoil_percentage_constraint
constraints.description: At most 30% of all bags can be topsoil.
